dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: Lately, I can't seem to get a good night's sleep...

dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: What should I do to improve my sleep?
At times like this, it's good to drink warm tea and lie down in bed!
이런 때는 따뜻한 차를 마시고 침대에 누우면 좋답니다!
I find that I fall asleep as soon as I open a book... How about trying to read a book?
저는 책만 펴면 잠이 쏟아지는데... 책을 읽어보시는 건 어때요?
Count some sheep! One sheep~ Two sheep... Oops, I dozed off!
양을 세어보세요! 양 한마리~양 두마리......앗 깜박 졸았네요!

dialogues.speaker: sheep
answer: Oh, right! I'll give it a try right away. Always grateful for your advice.
오호라 오늘 당장 시도해보겠네! 항상 고맙네.
Haha, I'm the same way! I'll try reading a book today. Maybe it's time for that!
하하하 나도 그렇다네! 오늘 책을 한번 읽어봐야겠구만~
Hey, don't count me! Haha, this popularity
아닛 나를 세어보라니! 하하하 이놈의 인기란~
